text:
@Mikel_Jollett Considering that the @gop are downplaying the dangers and spread of #Covid19, next time you get within a few feet of a @SenateGOP or @HouseGOP member or a Trump, spit at them!
Don’t worry, it won’t hurt them there’s no danger from #CoronaVirus! #SpitOnTheRich #COVID19US
